title: website that features morphing type
content:
Hi all,

Months ago I saw a website that showed a word (perhaps a word the user even chose), where the typeface was outlined, and it morphed from one typeface to another. It was great for demonstrating how different the shapes, x-heights, sizes, set-widths of varying faces can be.

Does anyone know what Iâ€™m talking about? And if so, please point me back to that website!

Thanks,

Paula
author: Paula Bodnar
